column1: Olavarría is a city in the province of Buenos Aires
column2: Argentina. It is the administrative seat of the Olavarría Partido and has over 111

column1: The settlement was officially founded on November 25
column3: and named in honour of Colonel José Valentín de Olavarría (1801–1845)
